name: advanced-mern-ai-financial-saas-platform
description: Advanced MERN AI Financial SaaS Platform with Vercel deployment

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist backend/dist node_modules client/node_modules backend/node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend linting not configured'
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:client: cd client && npm run test || echo 'Client tests not configured'
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && npm run test || echo 'Backend tests not configured'
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build
